gpt_result.nl_utterance: Show me a scatter plot with Human Capital Index on the x-axis and GDP per capita (PPP) on the y-axis, color-coded by Continent and proportional to Population, for countries with a Human Capital Index greater than zero and a GDP per capita (PPP) greater than 1000.

encoded_fields.nl_ref_phrase: GDP per capita (PPP) on the y-axis
Human Capital Index on the x-axis

constraints.nl_ref_phrase: with a Human Capital Index greater than zero
a GDP per capita (PPP) greater than 1000
